description: Supplier is required to conduct a comprehensive assessment of the current network infrastructure, providing recommendations for its modernization.
full_summary:
TBIPS
## Government Notice/Release

### Title
TBIPS – Multiple Resource Categories to Support Network Modernization

### Reference and Solicitation Information
*   **Reference Number**: cb-928-4911705
*   **Solicitation Number**: 20241631
*   **Revision Number**: 6

### Tender Details
*   **Publication Date**: February 2024
*   **Closing Date**: March 12, 2024, at 14:00 EST
*   **Procurement Category**: Services
*   **Procurement Method**: Competitive and Selective

### Trade Agreements
The procurement is covered under the following trade agreements:

*   Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
*   Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
*   Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
*   Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
*   Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
*   Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
*   Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
*   Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
*   Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
*   World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
*   Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
*   North American Free Trade Agreement (NAFTA)

### Contract Details

*   **Expected Start Date**: April 2024
*   **Expected End Date**: December 2025

### Point of Contact
For any further information or clarification, please contact:
*   **Name**: Michelle Fradette
*   **Email**: michelle.fradette@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
*   **Phone**: (343) 575-5064

Attachments
The attached documents contain the complete tender notice and supporting information.
